post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
FYI: For you or your friends.

We have several Sharepoint (MOSS) positions open, (different clients).
Most of these are permanent positions, however it may be
possible to talk to the clients about contract assignments.

If you have any friends who you can refer to me that would be great.
My specialty areas are J2EE or .NET technologies at all levels.


Regards

Chris Sherret
Sherret Inc.
Marketing / Consulting
chris@sherret.com
www.sherret.com
(416) 423-0798
(866) 640-0808 (fax)


2009-02-24-002 1-Sharepoint Architect and  2-Sharepoint Developer Contract and Fulltime positions

We have several positions open for both roles using MOSS Sharepoint technologies.

(1) Architect,  (2) Developer

These positions use all standard Microsoft tools.
MOSS, ASP.NET, SQL Server, Enterprise applications

AJAX Experience is an Asset

Locations: Toronto and Ottawa and Houston(Texas)
Duration: In Canada Permanent Positions, In USA Contract positions
Rate/Salary: Open
post.title: Sharepoint MOSS Architect - Sharepoint MOSS Developer positions Toronto, Ottawa, Houston
